thread.title: Disc Golf tournament coming to Knoxville
thread.title_full: Disc Golf tournament coming to Knoxville

title: Disc Golf tournament coming to Knoxville
text:
Disc Golf tournament coming to Knoxville Updated: Thu 5:10 PM, Oct 15, 2015 / Article 
KNOXVILLE, Tenn. (WVLT)-- KDGA – News Release 
The 10th Annual Volunteer Classic Disc Golf Tournament will be held this weekend. We should draw over 140 players from around the region, including several top 10 national players and the PDGA rookie of the year. The Pro Purse this year will be at least $7,000. 
We have added a “Final Nine” round this year. This will consist of 9 extra holes for the top four Pro finishers in the Open and Masters divisions. The round will start at 2:00 on Sunday at Victor Ash Park and will be a good time for spectators to come out and watch some great disc golf. 
You can check out more about the tournament at http://www.knoxdiscgolf.org/.
